name: speediness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being quick: Thank you for the speediness of your response. Our goal is speediness and efficiency. See
speedy
More examplesFewer examplesI'm going to use this browser when I need speediness.The speediness of the start of the program depends on how fast client will respond to each stepShe appeared to be trailed by those little horizontal stripes that indicate a cartoon character's speediness.
